casebody.data:
PEREZ
v.
AMERICAN AIRLINES, et al. No. 661PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 28, 2006. Joy H. Brewer, Cary, Kimberly A. D'Arruda, for American Airlines, et al. John A. Hedrick, Samuel A. Scudder, Raleigh, for Lori Perez. Joe E. Austin, Jr., Jennifer T. Gottsegen, Raleigh, for NC Asso. Defense Attorneys. Julia S. Hooten, Raleigh, for NCBBI.

*570The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of August 2006 by NCBBI for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of August 2006."
